webDevelopmentDescription: We create customized websites optimized for all platforms.
mobileAppDescription: We develop native and cross-platform mobile applications.
technicalConsultingDescription: We offer technical consulting to help take your project to the next level.
digitalMarketingDescription: Digital marketing strategies to increase your brand's visibility.
onixAcademyDescription: Explore our wide range of programming classes designed to help you grow your skills.
fundamentalsWebDevelopmentDescription: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This course will provide a solid foundation for building modern web applications.
advancedWebDevelopmentDescription: Dive deeper into advanced topics like React, Node.js, and API integration. Perfect for those looking to enhance their web development skills.
mobileAppDevelopmentDescription: Explore mobile app development using React Native. Learn how to create apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
introductionToProgrammingDescription: Get started with programming through Python. This course covers the basics of programming concepts and problem-solving.
